summary: Test suite that verifies the HunyuanDiT diffusion pipeline across a range of scenarios, including component accessibility, feed‑forward chunking, fused QKV projection handling, inference accuracy for single and batched inputs, checkpoint serialization with optional parts, CPU offloading, and a comprehensive integration run using a 1024‑parameter model configuration.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the HunyuanDiT diffusion model before deployment, ensuring that core functionalities, performance optimizations, and model persistence work as expected in production environments.
